field.name: popupwidth
field.label: Popup width
field.description: The width of the popup window

field.name: popupheight
field.label: Popup height
field.description: The height of the popup window

field.name: autopopup
field.label: Auto Popup
field.description: Automatically show popup window when new items are dumped.

field.name: maxdepth
field.label: Maximum recursion depth
field.description: The number of levels that should be dumped for arrays and objects. Min=1, max=20

field.name: maxstrlength
field.label: Maximum String Length
field.description: Long strings will be trimmed to this number of characters.

field.name: showOrigin
field.label: Show origin of call
field.description: Show the file, line and method from where dump was called.
